animeDescription: In Sekikashita Kusanagi, Senkuu discovers an alternative way to revive petrified peopleâ€“using Snickers! By feeding this chocolate to someone who has been petrified, that person will instantly revive just to have a taste of a Snickers bar. With this discovery, Senkuu uses Snickers to revive the famous comedian Kouki Kusanagi. [Written by MAL Rewrite]
